topic.title: The treatment of text in dialog boxes

body.p: In dialog boxes, for example, the Find and Replace box, the entry fields show the standard Windows behavior, regardless of whether the bidirectional language is active. Text is aligned to the left, and cursor movement is from left to the right.
This behavior cannot be changed in . It is assumed to be acceptable because of the shortness of the text.
